title: OPEC Secretary General commences mission to Congo by meeting Minister Itoua
description: Brazzaville, the Republic of the Congo, 23 August 2021--OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, began his mission to the Republic of the Congo by holding a bilateral meeting with HE Bruno Jean-Richard Itoua, Congoâ€™s Minister of Hydrocarbons and Head of Delegation to the Organization, in Brazzaville.
